markdownRemark.html: This was my first self-assembled quadcopter. Under the guidance of an NUS lecturer, Dr Colin Tan, I assembled the 450 frame drone and changed the circuitry with 3DR’s pixhawk flight controller, and connected it to a Futaba transmitter and receiver kit.
